subject: Simsonn pedal mounting bracket
description_text:
Hello,
I ordered pro x ultra pedals with VAM motors and mounting brackets for
brake and throttle.In my order I dont see mounting brackets.Could you check
it please?
My order is  #SSN4068

Thank you!

conversations.body_text: Hi Ante Klepo,    Do not worry, your order includes the U-shaped mounting bracket.

Thank you for fast response!
Best customer support !

sub, 29. stu 2025. 11:48 service@simsonn.com
